description:
This stand features a comfortable z-knob on a telescoping tripod base that makes it easy to set up and take down. The height is adjustable from 107 to 183cm, so taller folks don't have to bend down to work on their bike. Die-cast clamp applies fast, secure force onto the bike's tube without scratching or pinching the frame. An adjustable clutch allows your bike to rotate a full 360 degrees while it's attached to the stand.

  • Secure, telescopic tripod base is 25% bigger than the previous version, for increased stability and capacity. Tubing bottom and telescoping piece made of steel for increased durability
  • Durable aluminum collars won't break
  • Compacts into a small 16.5 x 107cm unit, so you don't need lots of room to store it
  • Load capacity is 27kg
  • Clamp range is 1.9 to 4.8cm thickness
name: Feedback Sports Sport Mechanic Work Stand
